attributes.action: Make Even More Public Spending Cuts
attributes.additional_details: Our National Debt is humungous, and our shoddy government aren't doing enough, because they're giving in to the unions. I say we cut EVEN MORE money from public spending, including all the pointless 'paper sorters' who do nothing in the public sector. Save our countries economy and start cutting wasteful spending even further, before it's too late!
